title: Get a well-being boost with this blue barrel
reviewText:
Excellent product which I've used for some time and which has numerous benefits for improving general well-being, especially for hair, bones, nails etc.
I ordered double my usual quantity, taking advantage of one of HB's wondrous offers. Incredible value for money.
I've found that whenever I've ordered from the HB website my requirements have been attended to in the same efficient, examplary fashion that one has come to expect when one visits any of the HB retail outlets. Outstanding service.

title: Contains titanium dioxide
reviewText: I tried to write a review about incompatability of product label on website with actual product label, re. titanium dioxide but it kept getting blocked - all I can suggest is you check out this ingredient for yourself before purchasing products that contain titanium dioxide.

title: I love this product!!
reviewText: I tried writing detailed review but wouldn't allow me to say anything about them, so all I can say is great product!

title: It works
reviewText: Love this product, great quality has really helped to improve my hair and skin

title: Good service
reviewText: The product arrived within a couple of days from ordering. Really good service.
Wonderful product and great service please keep up the good work!
Arrived promptly.Fantastic value for money.Great half price offer.

title: Speedy service
reviewText: From the initial product search to receipt of the item through the post was so quick and simple, would definitely use H&B again

title: Excellent Quality
reviewText:
A few years ago I asked one of the assistants in Holland and Barrett Inverness for some information on L-LYSINE, and other vitamins.
She was excellent, extremely knowledgeable and I'm delighted with the results, in fact I have recomended it to a number of people.
The quality is great, and the prices truly can't be beat!
I have recently had to go and seek advice again, and yet again I was delighted with the results and value for money!!

title: Very good supplement
reviewText: Highly recommended! Worked well for me. A bit on a bigger side, but not too difficult to swallow.

title: Great product, when it arrived
reviewText: Surprisingly long delivery. All was well when it arrived, but why did it take so long?

title: Great service.super quick delivery.
reviewText:
While ordering this product I forget to indicate that I wanted to take advantage of the buy one foe a penny on realising this I called their CS line, the chap I spoke to was very helpful and mailed me another bottle FOC as promised.
Great customer service.I have been a HB customer for many years.their products are high quality and great value for money.
I also purchase so much stuff for my family in Africa.
Will review this product once I start using it.

title: Great for cold sore!!
reviewText:
The best remedy against cold sore, it didn't come back.

The only negative point is the size of the tablets lol.

title: Cold Sore Aid
reviewText: Great Product - taken for years for cold sore problem.

title: tablets are huge
reviewText: A problem I have is that the tablets are huge and quite hard to crush otherwise work well

title: Fast
reviewText:
Good value. Excellent customer service Needed
to call and call centre was good

title: Awful
reviewText: I have still not received the goods I ordered. Where are they?

title: Good service
reviewText:
I was after Lysine tablets which I don't seem to be able to find in the H&B stores. It was a bargain under the plus-one pence deal but mailing costs almost doubled the cost particularly since I am ordering in Ireland and they are coming from the UK.

I like the product but I would prefer to be able to buy it in the store and have it delivered from within Ireland to reduce cost.

title: Fantastic product
reviewText: Steongly recommend this product. Thank you holland an barest for employing great knowledgeable staff in the Gateshead metro store

title: great product
reviewText: this is one of the best supplements i have taken..well worth the money!!

title: brilliant to keep coldsores at bay
reviewText: i cant write anything here as all i write is not allowed but i find this product good for what i use it for

title: Great product but need smaller tablets please!
reviewText:
Great product but the tablets are so big to swallow - I have to cut thm in half and normally I have no problems at all swallowing tablets. Any chance of manufacturing smaller ones?
Good price too :-)

title: 100% satisfied
reviewText: Been trying to write a review but some how it keeps refusing so all i can say is give this product a try and you will not regret it .

title: L-Lysine has helped enourmously
reviewText: I chose this product as it is a natural compound. I have been taking L-Lysine for 10 months now and it has changed my life!
